metadata.synopsis: The new guy (James Spader) in a Los Angeles high school does some singing and fights a hotshot (Paul Mones) over a disco dancer (Kim Richards).

reviews: ... "Tuff Turf" flails wildly from lyrical soft-focus to expressionistic angles to pixilated, quick-cutting MTV mannerisms.
You know a movie's in trouble when you start hoping for Divine to wander in and give it structure.
Clich ridden proceedings with an obligatory rock soundtrack.
...about as bad as it gets when it comes to cheesy '80s teen flicks.
